data.title: APE Pro - Monthly
data.description: Turn every link into a paywall with APE Pro - the creator's monetization toolkit.
data.seo_title: APE Pro Monthly - Auto Paywall Everything for Creators
data.seo_description: Unlock unlimited paywalls, split payouts, QR codes, and more. APE Pro is the ultimate monetization tool for serious creators.

product_data.hero_subtitle: For serious creators who want instant monetization without the tech headache.
bullets: Unlimited paywalls - gate any content, anywhere

faq.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq.answer: Yes! Cancel anytime with no questions asked. Your access continues until the end of your billing period.

faq.question: Do I need technical skills?
faq.answer: Not at all. APE is designed for creators, not developers. If you can copy and paste a link, you can use APE.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards through Stripe. Your payment info is never stored on our servers.

pro_tips: Start with your highest-value content to test demand before paywalling everything.
Use QR codes in your video content to drive direct purchases.
Set up split payouts before collaborating to avoid awkward money conversations later.

body.content: Most creators leave money on the table. They post content for free, hoping brands will eventually pay them. APE Pro flips the script - now every piece of content you create can generate revenue directly from your audience.

items: Get paid instantly when fans access your content

body.content: Pro Tip: Creators who paywall their behind-the-scenes content see 40% higher engagement than those who only sell finished products.
